DOC.brief_summary: Background : Cancer increasingly view chronic disease therefore grow need long-term treatment . Breast cancer survivor suffer physical impairment oncology treatment . This impairment reduces quality life ( QoL ) increase prevalence condition associate unhealthy life-style . Objective : The overall objective e-Cuidate telerehabilitation evaluate short long-term effect telehealth program . Methods : Seventy-two breast cancer survivor ( age range : 18-65 year ) recruit oncology breast unit Virgen de la Nieves Hospital San Cecilio Hospital association breast cancer patient Granada . Patients randomize receive online rehabilitation group ( n=36 ) usual care ( control ) group ( n=36 ) . Telerehabilitation group receive eight-week online intervention control group receive recommendation usual care . Discussion : The investigator study attempts increase level fitness reduce musculoskeletal disorder breast cancer patient strategy care base telerehabilitation promote therapeutic exercise .
DOC.brief_title: Telehealth System Improve Quality Life Breast Cancer Survivors
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis stage I , II , IIIA breast cancer Medical clearance participation Without chronic disease orthopaedic would interfere ability participate physical activity program Access Internet Basic ability use computer live relative ability Completion adjuvant therapy except hormone therapy No history cancer recurrence Have interest improve lifestyle : fitness/stress level Have sign inform consent
